messages.messageBody:
Just a quick note of thanks to all those who replied.

The plan is still on, although no dates are certain yet, and as they sort themselves
out, no doubt I'll be posting more questions.

Thomas

--

Whatever you Wanadoo:
http://www.wanadoo.co.uk/time/
